@Private public class TransitPeerSyncReplicationStateProcedure extends AbstractPeerProcedure<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.MasterProcedureProtos.PeerSyncReplicationStateTransitionState>
The procedure for transit current sync replication state for a synchronous replication peer.
